Source.Name: sassc
Source.Summary: Wrapper around libsass to compile CSS stylesheet
Source.Description: SassC is a wrapper around libsass used to generate a useful command-line application that can be installed and packaged for several operating systems.

Package.Name: sassc
Package.Summary: Wrapper around libsass to compile CSS stylesheet
Package.Description: SassC is a wrapper around libsass used to generate a useful command-line application that can be installed and packaged for several operating systems.
